item.title: 汉莎航空就收购 ITA 股份一事寻求说服欧盟监管机构
item.description: 汉莎航空公司高管和律师将于周五在布鲁塞尔出席为期一天的听证会，试图说服欧盟反垄断监管机构批准该公司收购意大利竞争对手 ITA 航空公司的少数股权。【原文：Lufthansa executives and lawyers will attend a day-long hearing in Brussels on Friday to try to convince EU antitrust regulators to clear the company's bid for a minority stake in Italian rival ITA Airways.】

item.title: 受降息和中东忧虑影响，华尔街 "恐惧指数 "创逾五个月新高
item.description: 受美国降息预期大幅回落和地缘政治紧张局势升级的影响，华尔街的 "恐惧指数 "周五创下五个多月来的最高值。【原文：Wall Street's "fear gauge" hit its highest in more than five months on Friday due to a sharp pullback in interest U.S. rate cut expectations and escalating geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 欧莱雅第一季度销售超预期，股价大涨
item.description: 法国化妆品巨头欧莱雅周四晚间公布第一季度销售额同比增长 9.4%，超过预期的 6.1%，欧莱雅股价在周五早盘交易中上涨超过 4%。【原文：Shares in L'Oreal rose more than 4% % in early Friday trading after the French cosmetics giant reported a 9.4% rise in first quarter sales on a like-for-like basis on Thursday evening, beating expectations of 6.1% growth.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金支持分拆高盛首席执行官和董事长职位的股东提案
item.description: 挪威 1.6 万亿美元的主权财富基金是全球最大的投资者之一，该基金周五表示，将再次投票支持一项要求分拆高盛首席执行官和董事会主席职务的决议。【原文：Norway's $1.6 trillion sovereign wealth fund, one of the world's largest investors, said on Friday it would again vote in favour of a resolution calling for a split of the CEO and board chair roles at Goldman Sachs .】

item.title: Take Five：与美元共舞
item.description: 就在降息似乎随时都会到来的时候，通货膨胀又抬头了，美元的强势迫使其他央行行长保护本国货币，重新考虑他们的政策选择。【原文：Just when it looked like rate cuts were coming any minute now, inflation has reared its head and the strength of the dollar is forcing other central bankers to protect their currencies and reconsider their policy choices.】

item.title: 比特币 "减半"：它是什么，重要吗？
item.description: 比特币期待已久的 "减半 "是一个重要事件，它将提升加密货币作为日益稀缺商品的价值，还是只是投机者为抬高价格而编造的一个技术性变化，这取决于你的立场。【原文：Bitcoin's long-anticipated 'halving' is, depending on where you sit, a vital event that will burnish the cryptocurrency's value as an increasingly scarce commodity, or little more than a technical change talked up by speculators to inflate its price.】

item.title: 加密货币粉丝倒计时比特币 "减半
item.description: 比特币爱好者们都在翘首期盼周五比特币的 "减半"--加密货币底层技术的改变旨在降低新比特币的生成速度。【原文：Bitcoin enthusiasts were eagerly waiting for bitcoin's 'halving' on Friday - a change to the cryptocurrency's underlying technology designed to cut the rate at which new bitcoins are created.】

item.title: 日产汽车因销量下降而将年度营业利润预期下调 14.5
item.description: 日产汽车周五将其年度营业利润预期下调了 14.5%，理由是汽车销量低于预期以及其他因素。【原文：Nissan Motor slashed its annual operating profit estimate by 14.5% on Friday citing lower-than-expected vehicle sales and other factors.】

item.title: 澳大利亚对麦格理银行罚款 640 万美元，因其未阻止非法第三方交易
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦法院周五对麦格理银行处以 1,000 万澳元（640 万美元）的罚款，原因是该银行缺乏控制措施来检测和防止第三方在客户账户上进行未经授权的收费交易。【原文：The Federal Court of Australia has fined Macquarie Bank A$10 million ($6.4 million) for its lack of controls to detect and prevent unauthorised fee transactions carried out by third parties on customer accounts, the securities regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: 越南央行表示继续支持陷入大规模欺诈的银行
item.description: 越南中央银行周五表示，已继续向西贡股份制商业银行（SCB）提供支持，该银行在 2022 年 10 月发生存款挤兑后被置于特别监管之下。【原文：Vietnam's central bank said on Friday it had continued providing support to Saigon Joint Stock Commercial Bank (SCB), which it put under special supervision in October 2022 after a run on its deposits.】

item.title: 在国际货币基金组织会议上，美联储迟迟不降息令全球同行不满
item.description: 随着美国通胀数据扰动从伦敦到巴西的市场，大大小小经济体的财务主管们正争先恐后地跟上美联储迅速重设降息预期的步伐。【原文：Finance chiefs from economies large and small are scrambling to keep pace with the Federal Reserve's rapid resetting of rate-cut expectations as U.S. inflation data roils markets from London to Brazil.】

item.title: 商务旅行回暖，美国航空公司前景看好
item.description: 过去三年来，美国航空公司的旅行业务蒸蒸日上，但在上一季度之前，大额消费的企业旅行者基本不见踪影。【原文：U.S. airlines have enjoyed a travel boom for the past three years, but until this past quarter, big-spending corporate travelers had been largely missing.】

item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook:】

item.title: 比特币因以色列打击伊朗的报道而跌破 60,000 美元
item.description: 据报道，以色列对伊朗发动导弹袭击后，加密货币大幅下跌，比特币周五跌破 60,000 美元，风险资产纷纷出逃。【原文：Cryptocurrencies fell heavily and bitcoin broke below $60,000 on Friday in a rush out of risky assets following reports of an Israeli missile strike on Iran.】

item.title: 枪支制造商敦促美国最高法院审理墨西哥诉讼案的上诉
item.description: 美国枪支制造商周四要求美国最高法院审理他们对墨西哥提出的 100 亿美元诉讼提出的质疑，该诉讼要求美国枪支制造商为跨越美墨边境向暴力贩毒集团贩运枪支提供便利而承担责任。【原文：U.S. gun manufacturers on Thursday asked the U.S. Supreme Court hear their challenge to Mexico's $10 billion lawsuit seeking to hold them responsible for facilitating the trafficking of firearms to violent drug cartels across the U.S.-Mexico border.】

item.title: 即时观点：石油和日元因以色列导弹袭击伊朗的报道而上涨
item.description: 据报道，以色列导弹击中了伊朗境内的一个地点，导致周五油价上涨，日元反弹。【原文：Oil prices rose and Japan's yen rallied on Friday on reports Israeli missiles have hit a site in Iran.】

item.title: 股市下挫，石油因中东袭击报道而大涨
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市和债券收益率下挫，而美元、日元、石油和黄金则在中东敌对行动急剧升级的报道后大涨。【原文：Asian shares and bond yields sank on Friday while the dollar, yen, oil and gold surged after reports of a sharp escalation in Middle East hostilities.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：苹果从中国应用商店下架 WhatsApp 和 Threads
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，苹果公司周五将 Meta Platforms 旗下的 WhatsApp 和 Threads 从中国应用商店下架，称是受政府命令。【原文：Apple removed Meta Platforms' WhatsApp and Threads from its app store in China on Friday saying it was ordered to by the government, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 消息人士称索尼与阿波罗商讨联合竞购派拉蒙事宜
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，索尼影视娱乐公司和阿波罗全球管理公司正在讨论联合竞购派拉蒙全球公司。【原文：Sony Pictures Entertainment and Apollo Global Management are discussing making a joint bid for Paramount Global , according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国数据和美联储推迟降息，美元飙升，将迎来周涨幅
item.description: 由于美国经济热度高于预期，投资者和政策制定者对美联储今年降息轨迹的预期推后，美元周五连续第二周上涨。【原文：The resurgent dollar headed towards a second straight week of gains on Friday as a hotter-than-expected U.S. economy has pushed back investors' and policymakers' expectations of the trajectory of Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 第一季度财报发布后，台积电在台北上市的股票下跌约 6
item.description: 在台积电发布第一季度财报后，该公司股价周五下跌约 6%，财报维持了资本支出和全年营收指引，并表示芯片行业只会逐步复苏。【原文：Taipei-listed shares of TSMC fell around 6% on Friday following the company's first-quarter earnings report where it retained its capex and full-year revenue guidance and flagged only a gradual recovery for the chip sector.】

item.title: 油价因美国利率持续走高的前景而有所回落
item.description: 周五早盘，油价下滑，原因是美国就业数据显示利率将在更长时间内走高，中东紧张局势的缓解抑制了供应担忧。市场基本摆脱了对委内瑞拉和伊朗的制裁。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early trade on Friday as U.S. jobs data pointed to higher interest rates for longer and easing tensions in the Middle East dampened supply concerns. The market largely shrugged off sanctions on Venezuela and Iran.】

item.title: 现代汽车因品牌安全问题暂停在 X 上投放广告
item.description: 韩国现代汽车周五表示，该公司已暂停在 X（前身为 Twitter）上投放广告，并正就品牌安全问题直接与伊隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下的社交媒体平台进行对话。【原文：South Korea's Hyundai said on Friday that it had paused advertising on X, formerly known as Twitter, and is speaking to the Elon Musk-owned social media platform directly about brand safety issues.】

item.title: 日本 3 月通胀率放缓至 2.6%，关注日本央行举措
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，由于食品价格温和上涨，日本 3 月份核心通胀率有所放缓，但仍远高于央行设定的 2% 的目标。【原文：Japan's core inflation slowed in March due to mild rises in food prices while staying comfortably above the central bank's 2% target, government data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克：如果通胀进展停滞，对加息持开放态度
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周四表示，如果通胀率不能像他预计的那样继续朝着美国央行2%的目标前进，央行行长们将需要考虑加息。 "如果通胀停滞不前，甚至开始朝着相反的方向发展，偏离我们的目标，我认为我们将别无选择，只能对此做出回应【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve Bank President Raphael Bostic on Thursday said that if inflation does not continue to move toward the U.S. central bank's 2% goal, as he expects it will, central bankers would need to consider an interest-rate hike. "If inflation stalls out or even starts moving in the opposite direction, away from our target, I don't think we'll have any other option but to respond to that】

item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 涂料生产商 PPG 第一季度营收不及预期，原因是销量下降
item.description: 由于工业和高性能涂料业务需求低迷，PPG 工业公司周四公布的第一季度营收不及预期。【原文：PPG Industries missed first-quarter revenue estimates on Thursday due to sluggish demand in its industrial and performance coating businesses.】

item.title: J&J公司在佛罗里达州妇女声称其婴儿爽身粉致癌一案中胜诉
item.description: 周四，佛罗里达州的一个陪审团得出结论，强生公司的婴儿爽身粉产品不会导致一名佛罗里达妇女患卵巢癌，该妇女已于 2019 年去世。【原文：A Florida jury on Thursday concluded that Johnson & Johnson's baby powder talc product did not cause the ovarian cancer of a Florida woman who died in 2019.】

item.title: T.T Rowe Price称2018年特斯拉薪酬符合投资者利益
item.description: 共同基金公司T. Rowe Price表示，埃隆-马斯克2018年从特斯拉获得的破纪录的薪酬待遇与这家电动汽车制造商的投资者利益 "表现出强烈的一致性"。【原文：Mutual fund firm T. Rowe Price said Elon Musk's record-breaking 2018 pay package from Tesla "demonstrated strong alignment" with the interests of investors at the electric carmaker.】

item.title: 手术机器人需求强劲，医疗设备制造商直觉公司业绩超出预期
item.description: Intuitive Surgical 公司周四公布的第一季度利润和营收超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于市场对其用于微创手术的机器人的需求增加。【原文：Intuitive Surgical beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit and revenue on Thursday, riding on higher demand for its robots used in minimally invasive procedures.】
